nO# mardhIq >6, rA tU Ba#ra >7 || 
GRuqtaM na pUqtaM taqnUra#rEqpAH Suciq hira#NyaM | 
tat tE# ruqkmO na rO#cata svadhAvaH || 
 uqBE su#Scandra saqrpiShOq darvI$ SrINISha Aqsani# | 
uqtO naq ut pu#pUryA uqkthEShu# Savasaspataq iSha(gg)# stOqtRuByaq A Ba#ra || 
vAyO# Saqta(gm) harI#NAM ~Myuqvasvaq pOShyA#NAM | 
uqta vA# tE sahaqsriNOq rathaq A yA#tuq pAja#sA || 
pra yABiq - [  ]  70
